kizuna_home_d_01:
[BD06:0]M[aster;iss:g] [trnm:0], about that
matter\r
with\r
which\r
I\r
need\r
your help...[npcn:29]
kizuna_home_d_02:
I have discovered the name of the incredibly
sweet condiment.[npcn:29]
kizuna_home_d_03: It is called Sweet Herba Mystica![npcn:29]
kizuna_home_d_04:
If you should find it during the course of your
Treasure Hunt, I would be grateful if you would\r
share some with me.[npcn:29]
kizuna_home_d_05:
[BD06:0]M[aster;iss:g] [trnm:0]... Have you
anything\r
to\r
report\r
about\r
the\r
Sweet\r
Herba Mystica?[npcn:29]
kizuna_home_d_system_01:
Give Mr. Saguaro some of your Sweet
Herba Mystica?
kizuna_home_d_system_02: You don’t have any Sweet Herba Mystica...
kizuna_home_d_06: So this...THIS is Sweet Herba Mystica![npcn:29]
kizuna_home_d_07:
I must—yes!—I must create something with it
right away![npcn:29]
kizuna_home_d_10:
My! What ambrosial sweetness! It is like a sweeter
Honey. A MUCH sweeter Honey.\c
Yes, as if Honey’s sweetness were multiplied
by one hundred![npcn:29]
kizuna_home_d_mob_02:
It smells suuuper sweet! And you looked so
happy eating it!
kizuna_home_d_12: N-no! You see, ah...there is a reason for this![npcn:29]
kizuna_home_d_mob_03:
You don’t LOOK like someone who likes sweets,
but that’s pretty cool!
kizuna_home_d_14:
I have spent my entire life trying to maintain the
image that others have of me.[npcn:29]
kizuna_home_d_15:
But now I see that it is possible to reconcile the
difference between my outward appearance and\r
my inner love of sweets.[npcn:29]
kizuna_home_d_16:
[BD06:0]Well then, M[aster;iss:g] [trnm:0],
here\r
is\r
a\r
reward\r
for\r
your\r
efforts,\r
as promised.[npcn:29]
kizuna_home_d_17:
Thanks to you, I was able to have a most
delectably sweet experience.[npcn:29]
kizuna_home_d_18:
Moreover, I even feel that my narrow-minded
views have broadened ever so slightly.[npcn:29]
kizuna_home_d_19: Please accept my heartiest of thanks.[npcn:29]
kizuna_home_d_system_03: You formed a close bond with Mr. Saguaro!
